languages.text:
"...Прежде такие, как он, шли в моритата -
Черную чистку, поклявшихся смертью дружину,
Гибель искавших и обретавших в сраженьях.
Но минули годы, и нет больше прежнего братства,
Только изгнание ждало усталого Волка.
Там, удалившись от братьев и смертных, отдаться
Мог он отравленной проклятью, сломившему сердце".

"...Before, ones such as he
to the Moritat would go,
that black purge,
warband sworn to death,
in battle doom seeking and finding.
But the years had passed,
and the old brotherhood
was no more.
Only exile awaited
the weary Wolf.
There, far from his brothers and mortals,
could he surrender
to the poisoned curse
that had cleaved his heart."
languages.original_text:
"...Прежде такие, как он, шли в моритата -
Черную чистку, поклявшихся смертью дружину,

Мог он отравленной проклятью, сломившему сердце".

languages.text:
「…以前までは、彼のような者は
罪状記に載せられただろう
黒き粛清
死を誓った戦士たちは
戦いに絶望を求め、見つける。
だが、年月は流れ
かつての兄弟は
消え失せた。
疲弊した狼を待ち受けているのは
追放のみ。
兄弟たちからも、人間たちからも遠く離れた場所で
心を蝕んだ
毒の呪いに
身を委ねることができる」
languages.original_text:
"...Before, ones such as he
to the Moritat would go,
that black purge,
warband sworn to death,
in battle doom seeking and finding.
But the years had passed,
and the old brotherhood
was no more.
Only exile awaited
the weary Wolf.
There, far from his brothers and mortals,
could he surrender
to the poisoned curse
that had cleaved his heart."

毒の呪いに
身を委ねることができる」

languages.text:
“……过去，像他这样的人，
只会去死亡之国，
誓死效忠于，
黑色的净化军团，
在无尽的战斗中一心求死。
但等到岁月蹉跎，
昔日的情谊，
不复如初，
疲惫的孤狼便只能踏上，
心灵的流放。
在那里，远离他的兄弟与一众凡人，
他终于可以，
毫无负担地屈服于，
那个毒害心灵的魔咒。”
languages.original_text:
"...Before, ones such as he
to the Moritat would go,
that black purge,
warband sworn to death,
in battle doom seeking and finding.
But the years had passed,
and the old brotherhood
was no more.
Only exile awaited
the weary Wolf.
There, far from his brothers and mortals,
could he surrender
to the poisoned curse
that had cleaved his heart."

那个毒害心灵的魔咒。”

languages.text:
« Autrefois, ses pareils
devenaient Moritats
et dans cette noire milice,
au service de la mort
aspiraient à périr
les armes à la main.
Mais les ans ont passé
et l'ancienne fraternité
n'est plus.
L'exil seulement attendait
le loup épuisé.
Là, loin de ses frères et des mortels,
pourrait-il enfin succomber
à la malédiction insidieuse
qui rongeait son cœur. »
languages.original_text:
"...Before, ones such as he
to the Moritat would go,
that black purge,
warband sworn to death,
in battle doom seeking and finding.
But the years had passed,
and the old brotherhood
was no more.
Only exile awaited
the weary Wolf.
There, far from his brothers and mortals,
could he surrender
to the poisoned curse
that had cleaved his heart."

languages.text:
«... Antaño, aquellos en su situación
se unían a los Moritat,
la purga negra,
la compañía de la muerte,
que busca y encuentra su caída en combate.
Mas el paso del tiempo todo lo cambia,
y la antigua hermandad
estaba ya extinguida.
Tan solo el exilio aguardaba
al Lobo cansado.
Allí, lejos de sus hermanos y los mortales,
podía rendirse
a la maldición emponzoñada
que su corazón había segado».
languages.original_text:
"...Before, ones such as he
to the Moritat would go,
that black purge,
warband sworn to death,
in battle doom seeking and finding.
But the years had passed,
and the old brotherhood
was no more.

the weary Wolf.
There, far from his brothers and mortals,
could he surrender
to the poisoned curse
that had cleaved his heart."

languages.text:
"... Früher gingen solche wie er
zum Moritat,
zu der schwarzen Geißel,
der Kriegsbande, dem Tod verschworen,
die im Kampf den Niedergang suchte und fand.
Doch die Jahre waren vergangen,
und die alte Bruderschaft
existierte nicht mehr.
Nur das Exil erwartete
den müden Wolf noch.
Dort, fern von seinen Brüdern und Sterblichen,
konnte er sich dem
giftigen Fluch hingeben,
der sein Herz entzweit hatte."
languages.original_text:
"...Before, ones such as he
to the Moritat would go,
that black purge,
warband sworn to death,
in battle doom seeking and finding.
But the years had passed,

languages.text:
"Önceden onun gibiler
Moritat olurdu.
O kara arınmayla
ölmeye yeminli savaşçılar,
sonlarını savaşta arayıp bulurdu.
Fakat üzerinden yıllar geçti
ve o eski kardeşlik
ortadan kayboldu.
Bitkin kurdu bekleyen tek şey
ta kendisiydi sürgünün.
Kardeşlerinden ve fânilerden uzak olduğu o yerde,
kalbini parçalayan
zehirli lanete
teslim olacaktı."
languages.original_text:
"...Before, ones such as he
to the Moritat would go,
that black purge,
warband sworn to death,
in battle doom seeking and finding.
But the years had passed,
and the old brotherhood
was no more.
Only exile awaited
the weary Wolf.
There, far from his brothers and mortals,
could he surrender
to the poisoned curse
that had cleaved his heart."
